Have you been frustrated by low-quality furniture?

We meet people all the time who complain about the lack of transparency. This is because most furniture companies offer low-quality furniture at high discounts, pushing the true cost to final users and the environment.

Many consumers choose to suffer from a half-broken sofa or bed. Because home improvement is expensive and highly time consuming.

Home improvement involves many challenges and hassles. In truth, trying to create a dream home, without breaking the bank or your back is impossible.

Act now and avoid future hassles.

QUALITY & AUTHENTICITY

We source furniture from reputable Italian brands. Furniture that are built by highest quality materials and craftsmanship.

UNMATCHED SERVICE

We offer flexible plans via rental or purchase with buy-back option. We take care of all the other hassles.

SAVE PRECIOUS TIME

We select products after extensive research. We have carefully chosen furniture configurations that maximize quality.

SUSTAINABILITY

Eliya is a circular economy that reduces furniture waste and increase product lifecycle. We ensure maximum transparency with our stakeholders.

The three easy steps to create your dream home.

1. On your terms

Decide if you need furniture for short-term or long-term. We offer flexible solutions.

2. Choose your furniture

Select from curated list of furniture. If you are not sure, we help you find the right furniture.

3. We do the rest

Lay back and relax. We take care of the shipment and installation of the furniture.
